li.label: painful bond tearing
li.description: To witness the bond torn so cruelly felt like a wound shared by all. There was a somber silence as if even the air around us held its breath in sorrow.

li.label: mediocre bond tearing
li.description: The ritual felt incomplete, as if the bond had slipped away rather than been properly honored. There’s a lingering unease, like the loss was half-hearted and unresolved.

li.label: bittersweet bond tearing
li.description: Though the bond has been parted, there’s a sense of peace in the air. We feel both the pain of loss and the gratitude for a bond cherished, leaving us quietly contemplative.

li.label: reverent bond tearing
li.description: As the bond dissolved, we were enveloped by a deep reverence. There is a sacred beauty in this farewell, one that fills us with awe and respect for the strength of their connection.
